subject: expedition type request
description_text: Hello, I would like to order the Simsonn Pro X Ultra pedal set but I have some questions. I live in France, so I wanted to know where the package was coming from and if I would have to pay customs fees upon receipt or not? Because I would really like to order it directly from your site. Thank you in advance for your reply.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mattéo Perrin,    You can place your order directly on our site, and we'll ship it to you from our German warehouse—no customs duties required.

wow thanks for the quick response, I'll go through your site then! and last
little question, if I take this additional kit with my pedal board "Simsonn
Pro X Ultra Pedals Upgrade Kit" does it really bring something extra to the
pedal board or not? know how it would be even better!


Le jeu. 23 oct. 2025 à 04:09, service@simsonn.com
What pedal are you currently using? This upgrade plan is for our previous Pro X customers, and it truly offers exceptional value for money.

it would be to accompany the Pro X ultra pedalboard, but from what I
understood with your message it is a simple upgrade for the old version of
the pro x is that it? for me by taking the Pro x ultra pedalboard
everything will already be on it, is that it?


Le jeu. 23 oct. 2025 à 04:18, service@simsonn.com

Great, thank you for your response, so I will place an order very soon, I
will also probably place another order later to test your S1 Steering Wheel!


Le jeu. 23 oct. 2025 à 04:23, service@simsonn.com
